comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Disability History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 92527070@N00
comment._content: What an amazing photo. I am so drawn to the little boy on the right!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I think this could be the McKinley Boys Home. It was founded 1900 as the Industrial Home Society, moved a few times around the LA area, from Artesia to Gardena to Van Nuys to San Dimas. In 1913-14 it would have been in Gardena, but about to move again. www.mckinleycc.org/whoweare_history.shtml
